data.message: Eminem...my daughter is a huge fan.  You are her number one artist.  She has the following words tattooed on her arm :  It's no one's fault but my own, it's the path I've chosen to go.  She is going thru a very rough time right now personally and financially and is facing 2 major surgeries this year to rebuild her hips.  Her first one is June 10th.  Not sure if you will read this but if you have time to make her dream come true and drop her a note or phone call I couldn't thank you enough.  Anything you can do to help her...would be appreciated.  Private message me if you are able to help her.
